title: altchiefmaster
author: altchiefmaster
content: Welcome to the Evolution of Passive Income. Creating a brand new Ecosystem of utilities all designed to generate additional token volume which will generate additional passive income for all the holders. PIS token offer passive stable-coin income via its innovative token distribution strategy and advanced tokenomics. With each transaction (Buy, Sell or Transfer) a 10% transaction fee is applied which is automatically distributed in the following way:🔰 5% REWARDS FEE: sent to the holders and investors in $BUSD stablecoin🔰 1% LIQUIDITY POOL:  2% of every transaction is transferred into the Liquidity Pool to create a stable price floor.🔰 1% BUY BACK:  2% of every transaction is used for strategic BuyBack & Burn.🔰 3% Development and Marketing: 3% of every transaction is sent for Development and marketing, utility development,   exchange and staffing costs. The passive income you receive will vary depending on the total amount of PIS token you hold and the token's daily trading volume. PIS's vision for a completely new way to look at passive income is simple: hold PIS token in your crypto wallet and let us do the rest! You will earn passive income 24 hours a day through our revolutionary blockchain-based tokenomics system. A very different way to see passive income from traditional sources like rental properties, royalties or stock dividends. Initially your rewards are generated from every Buy, Sell, or Transfer of the PIS token  based on the total amount of PIS you hold. When our suite of revenue generating utilities are launched, these will create further sources of passive income for holders.Passive Income System🛣Initial Roadmap    ✳️ Research & Developement | Defining    ✳️ Socials Media |Deployment    ✳️FairLaunch On Pancakeswap | Ownership renounce     ✳️ Social Media Ads | Create Community    ✳️ Whitepaper v1 , Techrate Audit     ✳️Coin market cap + Coin Gecko listingsocial media:TG https://t.me/PassiveIncomeSystemTwitter: https://twitter.com/PIncomeSystemfacebook https://www.facebook.com/PIncomeSysteminstagram https://www.instagram.com/pisystem2023/tiktok: https://www.tiktok.com/@pi.system
